SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable, Remote, GameControllerInterface
public class GameController extends Object implements GameControllerInterface, Serializable, Runnable
GameController Class
Controls a specific Game GameModel by allowing a player to perform all actions that can be executed in a game The class can add, remove, reconnect and disconnects players to the game and let players grab and position tiles from the playground to the shelf.

It manages all the game from the beginning GameStatus.WAIT to the ending GameStatus.ENDED checking CommonCards, GoalCards and FinalChecks.
See Also:

      PlayerAlreadyInException - when in the game there is already another Player with the same nickname

      Parameters:
      p - Player that want to reconnect
      Throws:
      PlayerAlreadyInException - if a player tries to rejoin the same game
      MaxPlayersInException - if there are already 4 players in game
      GameEndedException - the game is ended

      public void positionTileOnShelf(String p, int column, TileType type)

      Specified by:
      positionTileOnShelf in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:

      column - the column where you want to position the tile
      type - the type of the tile
      Throws:
      NotPlayerTurnException - when a player wants to position tiles and, it's not his turn
